        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Electromagnetic spectrum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das elektromagnetische Spektrum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le spectre électromagnétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O spectrum eletromagnético</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo spettro elettromagnetico</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">El espectro electromágnetico</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A an interactive demostration of the electromagnetic spectrum and its realtion to wavelengths</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electromagnetic spectrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein interaktives demostration des 
elektromagnetischen Spektrums und seines realtion zu den 
Wellenlängen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un demostration interactif du spectre 
électromagnétique et de son realtion aux longueurs d'onde</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um demostration interativo do spectrum

          </description>
          <description>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un demostration interactivo del espectro

          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektromagnetisches Spektrum</string>

          <keyword>
